price: ¡Oh, Gente del Libro! ¿Por qué no creen en la palabra de Dios, siendo que creyeron en ella anteriormente?
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنتُمۡ تَشۡهَدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-antum tashhadūna
